page.title: 02WITHINGTON ST.MICHAEL'S.
page.content: The Church is dedicated to{St. {Michael and all Angels.}The church is part of the Northleach rural deanery and the diocese of Gloucester.The present rector Revd. Worsdell is also rector of St.Andrews Hazleton and St. Oswalds Compton Abdale. Services are held weekly.There is a {church choir}and a{bellringing group The church bells were repaired and rehung in 1981.A{Sunday School}is held in the village school once a month for children who live in the three parishes.A public address system has been installed in the church during this year. Parishioners are concerned at present,that Withington may not have a resident priest,if new plans for pastoral reorganization are adopted by the diocese.There are 113 people on the church electorial roll.
